      • setOption

        public InventoryMenu.Builder setOption(int position,
                              org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack icon,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String... info)
        Sets the option at the specified position to the specified item. The item will have the specified name and lore. All strings must be color-formatted by the caller.
        Parameters:
        position - The zero-based index of the item.
        icon - The item itself to use.
        name - The color-formatted name of the item.
        info - The color-formatted lore of the item.
        Returns:
        This instance.
